vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἐλεισάβετ (T, Rec. Ἐλισ-; see WH, App., 155), ἡ indecl. (Heb. אֱלִישֶׁבַע)
Elizabeth: Luk.1:5 ff.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Luk.1.5; married to Zechariah (G2197H);
mother of: John (G2491)
§ Elizabeth, "God [El] is [my] oath"
Elizabeth the wife of Zechariah and mother of John the Baptist, Lk. 1:5, 13, 24, 36, 57
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利沙伯 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神的誓言"
撒迦利亞的妻子, 施洗約翰的母親, 來自祭司家族, 瑪利亞的親戚
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以利沙伯 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "神的誓言"
撒迦利亚的妻子, 施洗约翰的母亲, 来自祭司家族, 玛利亚的亲戚
